name: 2024 The International Conference on Virtual Reality Technology
content: Publicationï¼š Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1018-6), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
